name: ai-pipeline-stack
description: Systems 8,11,16,17,27,35,36,38-41: AI Pipeline, LiteLLM, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Flowise, CI/CD, Dev Environments
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  # System 8 — LiteLLM Proxy
  omni-litellm:
    image: ghcr.io/berriai/litellm:main-latest
    container_name: omni-litellm
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      LITELLM_MASTER_KEY: ${LITELLM_MASTER_KEY}
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://${POSTGRES_USER}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@omni-postgres:5432/litellm
    volumes:
      - ./litellm-config:/app/config
    ports:
      - '4000:4000'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: litellm
      omni_quantum_tier: critical
      omni_quantum_system: '8'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    healthcheck:
      test: ['CMD', 'curl', '-f', 'http://localhost:4000/health']
      interval: 15s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 3
    depends_on:
      omni-postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 11 — Flowise
  omni-flowise:
    image: flowiseai/flowise:latest
    container_name: omni-flowise
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      DATABASE_TYPE: postgres
      DATABASE_HOST: omni-postgres
      DATABASE_PORT: '5432'
      DATABASE_NAME: flowise
      DATABASE_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER}
      DATABASE_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}
    ports:
      - '3001:3000'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: flowise
      omni_quantum_tier: standard
      omni_quantum_system: '11'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    healthcheck:
      test: ['CMD', 'curl', '-f', 'http://localhost:3000']
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 16 — OpenHands
  omni-openhands:
    image: ghcr.io/all-hands-ai/openhands:latest
    container_name: omni-openhands
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      LLM_API_BASE: http://omni-litellm:4000
      LLM_API_KEY: ${LITELLM_MASTER_KEY}
      WORKSPACE_DIR: /workspace
    volumes:
      - openhands-workspace:/workspace
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
    ports:
      - '3002:3000'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: openhands
      omni_quantum_tier: high
      omni_quantum_system: '16'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 17 — SWE-Agent
  omni-swe-agent:
    image: sweagent/swe-agent:latest
    container_name: omni-swe-agent
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      LLM_API_BASE: http://omni-litellm:4000
      LLM_API_KEY: ${LITELLM_MASTER_KEY}
    volumes:
      - swe-agent-workspace:/workspace
    ports:
      - '3003:8000'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: swe-agent
      omni_quantum_tier: high
      omni_quantum_system: '17'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 27 — Semantic Cache
  omni-semantic-cache:
    image: omni-quantum/semantic-cache:latest
    container_name: omni-semantic-cache
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      REDIS_URL: redis://:${REDIS_PASSWORD}@omni-redis:6379/2
      QDRANT_URL: http://omni-qdrant:6333
      EMBEDDING_API_URL: http://omni-embedding:8080/embed
    ports:
      - '8090:8090'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: semantic-cache
      omni_quantum_tier: high
      omni_quantum_system: '27'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 35 — Woodpecker CI
  omni-woodpecker:
    image: woodpeckerci/woodpecker-server:latest
    container_name: omni-woodpecker
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      WOODPECKER_GITEA: 'true'
      WOODPECKER_GITEA_URL: http://omni-gitea:3000
      WOODPECKER_DATABASE_DRIVER: postgres
      WOODPECKER_DATABASE_DATASOURCE: postgres://${POSTGRES_USER}:${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}@omni-postgres:5432/woodpecker?sslmode=disable
    ports:
      - '8000:8000'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: woodpecker
      omni_quantum_tier: standard
      omni_quantum_system: '35'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    healthcheck:
      test: ['CMD', 'wget', '--spider', '-q', 'http://localhost:8000/healthz']
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

  # System 36 — Code Server (Dev Environments)
  omni-code-server:
    image: linuxserver/code-server:latest
    container_name: omni-code-server
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      PASSWORD: ${CODE_SERVER_PASSWORD}
      SUDO_PASSWORD: ${CODE_SERVER_SUDO_PASSWORD}
    volumes:
      - code-server-data:/config
      - dev-workspace:/workspace
    ports:
      - '8443:8443'
    labels:
      omni_quantum_component: code-server
      omni_quantum_tier: standard
      omni_quantum_system: '36'
      omni_quantum_stack: ai-pipeline
    networks:
      - omni-quantum-network

volumes:
  openhands-workspace:
  swe-agent-workspace:
  code-server-data:
  dev-workspace:

networks:
  omni-quantum-network:
    external: true
